description: Have you ever wondered why there are so many different types of chocolate? It's because it can be made in so many different ways. This poses an obvious problem to anyone who wants to learn how to make chocolate themselves, which cooking method is best? If you ask 5 chefs, you'll get 6 baking recipes. Fortunately, we've taken the guess work out of making chocolate. Learn the simple tricks and neat tips with this ebook that will turn your next batch of chocolate into a masterpiece. Get yours today! This easy to read guide will let you master basic cocoa as well as white, dark, and milk chocolate for fondue, cakes, cookies, truffles, and many more delicious treats that you have grown to love at the bakery. Read all about it in this comprehensive book.
